name: Orcades
description:
Orcades is an action-adventure modification for Gothic I.

The mod takes place on a small island and focuses mainly on new and innovative quests and NOT on an epic story or a big and open world.

At the beginning you strand at the beach of your island. After you regain consciousness and explore the island, you find out to your surprise that the island isn't abandoned at all. There are some curious characters and evil monsters. The island has changed a lot!
The game features 4 chapters filled with innovative quests, new ideas and a very detailed world that pushes the ZenGine Engine of Gothic I to the limit.
